summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) population monitoring roster or census report, generated on July 8, 2019. It lists inmate movements and statuses, including multiple entries for Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, showing his status changes (e.g., HLD, PRE, DES) in the months leading up to and including his final custody date.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as an inmate with the register number 76318-054. The document shows multiple entries for his status (e.g., HLD, PRE, DES) at the New York Metropolitan (NYM) facility from March to July 2019.

events.title: Epstein's final roster entry
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is listed on a Bureau of Prisons population monitoring roster with the status 'AP A-DES' from the New York Metropolitan facility.

events.title: Epstein designated to another location
events.description: An entry shows Jeffrey Epstein with the action 'AP A-DES' (likely meaning Appeared/Designated) from the New York Metropolitan facility.

events.title: Epstein's pre-trial detention and status changes
events.description: Multiple entries for Jeffrey Epstein at the NYM facility show status codes like 'AT A-PRE' (Present), 'AT A-HLD' (Hold), and 'RTF COURT' (Return from Court), documenting his custody movements while awaiting trial.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's federal inmate register number was 76318-054.
The document is a Bureau of Prisons population monitoring roster dated July 8, 2019, tracking inmate movements and statuses.
Epstein had numerous status entries (e.g., HLD, PRE, DES) at the New York Metropolitan facility from March to July 2019.
The final entry for Epstein shows an 'AP A-DES' action on July 2, 2019, from the NYM facility, with the roster generated on July 8, 2019.
The document includes entries for other inmates at facilities coded BRO, CAA, and LOR, indicating it is a system-wide report.
